snippet.title: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable | First Concept Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + 3 + Pro
snippet.description:
VR Hunting Action Game "Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable" is coming to Meta Quest 2 / Meta Quest 3 / Meta Quest Pro this winter: https://metaque.st/3IRVTCB 

In Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable, players are tasked with taking on unique missions as members of the Scout Regiment. They will need to combine entirely free three-dimensional movement through use of their Omni-directional Mobility (ODM) Gear with cross-range combat in order to defend themselves against killer titans. As players progress, the battle difficulty will increase, so only those with determination and skills critical to making it through to the final battle will survive.

Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable will feature both singleplayer and co-op modes, and will be available in both Japanese and English dubbed and subbed.

Official Website: https://aotvrub.com/ 
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/AoTVRUB

© Hajime Isayama / Kodansha Ltd. ©︎UNIVRS, Inc.
